text: Silva () is a 1944 Soviet musical movie directed by Aleksandr Ivanovsky.СильваСильва (1944) It stars Zoya Smirnova-Nemirovich, Niyaz Dautov, and Margarita Sakalis. == Actors == * Zoya Smirnova-Nemirovich as Silva Varescu (as Z. Smirnova-Nemirovich) * Niyaz Dautov as Edvin (as N. Dautov) * Margarita Sakalis as Stassi (as M. Sakalis) * Sergey Martinson as Boni (as S. Martinson) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1944 musical movies Category:Soviet musical movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Ivanovsky
title: Silva (movie)
